title: How to Choose the Perfect Paint Color for Your Home
shortDesc: Learn expert tips to select the ideal paint color to transform your living space.

fullContent.content: Choosing the right paint color can completely transform your home, creating a space that reflects your personality and style. At Lohani Paints and Hardware in Gaya, Bihar, we’ve been helping customers find their perfect shades since 1995. Here’s how to make an informed choice for your next painting project.

fullContent.alt: Person painting a wall with a roller

fullContent.content: Consider the Room’s Purpose

The function of a room influences its color palette. For example, warm colors like reds and oranges energize social spaces like living rooms, while calming blues and greens suit bedrooms or study areas. Visit our store in Gaya for personalized color consultations to match your vision.
Test Under Your Lighting

Lighting dramatically affects how paint colors appear. Natural daylight, LED bulbs, or warm incandescent lights can alter a shade’s look. Test samples on your walls and observe them at different times of day. Our premium paints at Lohani Paints ensure consistent color quality across lighting conditions.
Choose the Right Finish

Paint finishes impact both aesthetics and durability. Matte finishes hide imperfections but are less durable, while satin or semi-gloss finishes are ideal for high-traffic areas like kitchens. We stock a range of finishes to suit every need, from interior to exterior projects.

title: Top 5 Hardware Maintenance Tips for DIY Painters
shortDesc: Keep your painting tools in top condition with these essential maintenance tips.

fullContent.content: Proper maintenance of your painting tools ensures they last longer and perform better. At Lohani Paints and Hardware, we supply high-quality tools and share expert tips to keep them in excellent shape for your DIY projects.

fullContent.alt: Painting tools including brushes and rollers

fullContent.content: Clean Brushes and Rollers Immediately

After painting, clean brushes and rollers with water (for latex paints) or mineral spirits (for oil-based paints). This prevents paint buildup and keeps bristles soft. Our Gaya store offers cleaning solutions to simplify the process.
Store Tools Properly

Store tools in a dry, cool place to prevent rust or damage. Wrap brushes in paper to maintain their shape and hang rollers to avoid flattening. Invest in our durable storage solutions for long-lasting tool care.

title: Eco-Friendly Painting: Sustainable Practices for Your Home
shortDesc: Discover how to paint sustainably with eco-friendly products and practices.

fullContent.content: Sustainable painting reduces environmental impact while creating beautiful spaces. At Lohani Paints and Hardware, we’re committed to offering eco-friendly paint options and practices for environmentally conscious homeowners in Gaya, Bihar.
Choose Low-VOC Paints

Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs) in traditional paints can harm indoor air quality. Opt for low-VOC or zero-VOC paints from our range to ensure a healthier home. These paints offer vibrant colors and durability without harmful emissions.
Recycle and Reuse

Recycle empty paint cans at local facilities and use reusable drop cloths to minimize waste. Our team can guide you on proper disposal and sustainable painting techniques to reduce your environmental footprint.

title: Exterior Painting Tips for Bihar’s Climate
shortDesc: Protect your home with these expert tips for exterior painting in Bihar’s weather.

fullContent.content: Bihar’s hot summers, monsoon rains, and occasional cold winters demand durable exterior paints. Lohani Paints and Hardware offers weather-resistant paints and expert advice to keep your home looking vibrant year-round.
Choose Weather-Resistant Paints

Select paints designed for high humidity and UV exposure, such as our premium exterior emulsions. These paints resist fading, cracking, and peeling, ensuring long-lasting protection for your home in Gaya’s climate.
Prep Surfaces Thoroughly

Proper surface preparation is key. Clean walls to remove dirt and mildew, and apply a high-quality primer to enhance adhesion. Our team provides end-to-end painting services to ensure flawless results.
